plot outline: A boy who is born rich, has never seen the darker side of life until he falls in love with a girl of darker past . A thriller lover Story which revolves around the protagonist Abhishek and his love life Sanya who he love like mad. It starts with abhishek's feeling of uneasiness in love, when he is feeling betrayed in love, while discovering the reason for betrayal he gets to know many perspective of her sanya's life by meeting different people of her past relationships, every point of view is narrated by different person has different meaning , things starts taking a grip of Abhishek and at one point he reaches a stage of confusion and lost in darkness. Story reaches peak when Abhishek decides to kill Sanya with her ex boyfriend and then he gets a brief of the same story from sanya's perspective . Every character has their version to the same story which brings entertainment and excitement together , every single dialogue has its unique meaning. A new generation love story, presents the contemporary and relatable love angles which connects with today's youth, a multi-layered narration makes the film( interactive) with melodious songs makes a film "A prefect romantic thriller". Bekhudi "Love meets reality"
